name: WKScriptMessage
desc: An object that encapsulates a message sent by JavaScript code from a webpage.

items.name: var frameInfo: WKFrameInfo
items.desc: The frame that sent the message.

items.name: var webView: WKWebView?
items.desc: The web view that sent the message.

items.name: var world: WKContentWorld
items.desc: The namespace in which the JavaScript code executes.

items.name: var name: String
items.desc: The name of the message handler to which the message is sent.
